name: BMIPercentile
title: BMI percentile
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent BMI percentile. ),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Physical Exam, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying BMI percentile as a result. concept.display: Body mass index (BMI) [Percentile] Per age and sex
